summary: The crew of the USS Enterprise explores the furthest reaches of uncharted space, where they encounter a new ruthless enemy, who puts them, and everything the Federation stands for, to the test.
cast: Chris Pine|Zachary Quinto|Karl Urban|Zoe Saldana|Simon Pegg|John Cho|Anton Yelchin|Idris Elba|Sofia Boutella|Joe Taslim|Lydia Wilson|Deep Roy|Melissa Roxburgh|Anita Brown|Doug Jung|Danny Pudi|Kim Kold|Fraser Aitcheson|Matthew MacCaull|Emy Aneke|Shohreh Aghdashloo|Greg Grunberg|Jennifer Cheon Garcia|Jarod Joseph|Jeremy Raymond|Harry Han|Gina Brinkman|Adam DiMarco|Fiona Vroom|Richard Laurence|Douglas Chapman|Dan Payne|Anthony Shim|Andrea Yu|Shea Whigham|Christian Sloan|Jake Huang|Priya Rajaratnam|Luka Hays|Thomas Cadrot|Jennifer W. title: Star Trek: Más allá
